Articles.Content:
Hi, I just bought KSP.

But when i opened it, i found it to be in some weird language (Which i cannot understand). I want it to be in English. How to change it. The problem is that I don't understand the Setting Menu either. Please help.

i know this is a silly question, but i did not find any thread with this question and nothing was given in wiki either. Sorry if I missed it somewhere.
Where did you buy the game?

Hi. If you bought the game from the KSP store, the 1.2.9 prerelease can be downloaded in a number of languages. The current 1.2.2 stable release should be English only.

If you've bought the game on Steam and selected the prerelease branch under the "betas" tab of KSP's steam properties, you should be able to select which language the game downloads and updates in via the language tab.

Or you can go back to "NONE - Opt out of all beta programs" in the Betas tab to download the current 1.2.2 stable release.
